title: Account transfer
body: Hi im level 23 and want to transfer to the Japanese server but the option is not there I wanted to know when i would be able to transfer, because I'm in Japan now and cant play (accounts in NA server).

replies.body: [**Account transfers**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) still have some maintenance going on, but it does look like they should be back up sometime late Jan or early Feb. HollyMonster did mention some type of discount as well when they do come back up!
